alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:14PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. So far, 5 to 10 inches has fallen. An additional 5 to 10 inches is possible. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park, Absaroka Mountains and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Thursday. Moderate snow will again break out after midnight tonight, with heavy snow possible Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be difficult. Visibility could be down to a quarter mile at times. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Yellowstone National Park
